description:
Ultra fast. Ultra easy. UltraSearch.

Find what you need in seconds. UltraSearch finds your files and documents on all your connected hard drives and network drives. Search by file type, document content or file properties. Get your valuable time back and let UltraSearch do the searching for you.

When using UltraSearch, we automatically provide you the full functionality of UltraSearch Professional for 30 days, free of charge. After this period is over, UltraSearch switches to the limited freeware mode.

Note: This app requires admin privileges for the installation. The application itself can be run without elevated privileges.

Installation instructions:
UltraSearch is automatically installed in English to "Program Files\JAM Software\UltraSearch".
There are two parameters you can give to the installer if you add "-params" to the installation command:

1. "/dir=Your_Dir"
Changes the installation location to "Your_Dir".

2. "/lang=DE"
Changes the language from English to German. For all supported languanges see: https://www.jam-software.com/ultrasearch/help.shtml#supported-languages

Example:
cinst ultrasearch -params "/dir=C:\Users\Administrator\Admin Tools\ /lang=de"
summary: Find what you need in seconds. UltraSearch finds your files and documents on all your connected hard drives and network drives.
author: JAM Software GmbH
